function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to contagious diseases in residential care facilities","Impact":"Increased vulnerability of elderly residents to contagious diseases such as COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict infection control measures, vaccination programs, and regular testing","Technologies":"Smart environmental monitoring systems, telemedicine, and contact tracing apps","People":"Elderly residents in residential care facilities, staff members, and visitors","Owner":"Healthcare providers, facility management, and government authorities"},{"Description":"Informal housing networks contributing to disease spread","Impact":"Transmission of contagious diseases through informal housing networks and social relationships","Mitigation":"Education on infection control, promotion of hygiene practices, and regulation of housing agents' behavior","Technologies":"Digital communication tools for education and awareness, surveillance systems for monitoring compliance","People":"Housing agents, landlords, tenants, and community members","Owner":"Government authorities, public health agencies, and housing regulatory bodies"}]}
